channel.title: How do i make a server and create what i want on it?
channel.description:
im super noob at this and realy badly wana make my own server but i have no idea on how to.....
i have followed this turt [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html[/url]
i have downloaded JDK dunno what to do with it..... i have created a no-ip dunno what to do with Setting up your Environmental Variables Downloading a source/base-is this downloading a client? i have portfowed the the port 43594
now what do do how???

item.title: How do i make a server and create what i want on it?
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

Newty:

If that tutorial can’t teach you, then I doubt you are ready to make your own server. Or, more importantly, begin programming.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make a server and create what i want on it?
item.dc:creator: @milla12 milla12
item.description:
@milla12 wrote:

so all i do is click the runserver on the homie sorce with my no-ip program open???[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 30, 2009, 01:47:57 am[/size][hr]when i go to Runserver in the source file it says

reapagescape v1
not online… not runedeaths.no-ip.biz

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a server and create what i want on it?

item.title: How do i make a server and create what i want on it?
item.dc:creator: @sk1ttlezrule43v sk1ttlezrule43v
item.description:
@sk1ttlezrule43v wrote:

[quote=“milla12, post:10, topic:281104”]i downloaded this cleinthttp://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,344927.0.html
how do i get it to run my server…
runedeaths.no-ip.biz[/quote]

Okay… Homiescape is a source…

And firstly, I would use http://client.silabsoft.org/client.php to test this.
Open up your source file, and go down untill you see a black square like image probably named ‘Runserver.Bat’. Now click it, and leave it on. Now your server should be online.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make a server and create what i want on it?
item.dc:creator: @sk1ttlezrule43v sk1ttlezrule43v
item.description:
@sk1ttlezrule43v wrote:

[quote=“milla12, post:8, topic:281104”]i havent dont any thing… i need to start from scratch

Do you have your runserver.bat. Or whatever cmd file you have on?
<no[/quote]

Well for your server to be online, you need to open your runserver.bat. And wait for it to say online. Or whatever it is supposed to say. Without that up, your server will never run. Unless you have a vps hosting company.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make a server and create what i want on it?
item.dc:creator: @sk1ttlezrule43v sk1ttlezrule43v
item.description:
@sk1ttlezrule43v wrote:

Try one of your ips in the:

run > cmd > ipconfig:

Or 0.0.0.0 with port 50? or 80.

EDIT: Do you have your runserver.bat. Or whatever cmd file you have on?

item.title: How do i make a server and create what i want on it?
item.dc:creator: @sk1ttlezrule43v sk1ttlezrule43v
item.description:
@sk1ttlezrule43v wrote:

milla12:

… i dont have a client to log into for some reason when i run moparscape it loads the closes by itself

There is Silab, to test it on, or just get a client from server downloads section.
And if it’s closing instantly, you must have a problem with java. Or how the client was coded.
Or any errors when previous coding.

item.title: How do i make a server and create what i want on it?
item.dc:creator: @sk1ttlezrule43v sk1ttlezrule43v
item.description:
@sk1ttlezrule43v wrote:

EDIT: Go into your settings, and replace the variables. With the ones given in that link.
And your basicly done. Give it a try and log in? Or there is also your self editing part.
Set the port on your server to 50. And the ip to 0.0.0.0
(note): It’s for testing your updates. But I have a vps for all of this. So I’m not big with this stuff.

Read full topic
